data.eml:eml: Original data comes from a project which takes or took place as part of the DFG priority program "Exploratories for large-scale and long-term functional biodiversity research". The data is stored together with descriptive metadata, in combination called a dataset, in the project repository (https://www.bexis.uni-jena.de). Species information was extracted from that original dataset. The second paragraph is part of the metadata of the original dataset.</br>In this data file 16S rRNA gene based analysis of forest and grassland soil procaryotic community composition and diversity "Schwaebische Alb" is stored. The data is intended to be used for synthesis of data associated with the joint soil sampling campaign 2008.
